type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks with ranged weapons, Thorn
Long Gunner Infantry, Field Mechaniks, Sword Knights, Precursor Knights
Gun Mage Captain Adept, Journeyman Warcaster

benefits.ingameeffect: Reduce the point cost of each Long Gunner Infantry unit by 1.
Add a unit attachment to one Long Gunner Infantry unit free of cost. The unit attachment ignores FA restrictions.
'Jack Marshaled warjacks and the units that control them gain Advance Deployment
Models/units in the army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks with ranged weapons, Lancers, Thorn

benefits.ingameeffect: You can redeploy one Trencher model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

For each Trencher Commando or Trencher Infantry unit, place on trench template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Haley's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Trench templates cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature but can be placed within 3" of each other.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Warjacks with Damage type Electricity or weapons with Electro Leap, Thorn.
Stormblade units, Arcane Tempest units, Field Mechanic units, Stormsmith Storm Tower
Stormcaller, Arcane Tempest solos, Arlan Strangewayes, Stormblade solos

benefits.ingameeffect: For each Field Mechanik unit in the army, 1 Storm Strider gains Advance Move.
For each Stormsmith Storm Tower, add a Stormsmith Stormcaller free of cost. These models do not count toward FA restrictions.
Warjack(s) in Haley’s battlegroup is(are) automatically allocated 1 focus point at the start of your first Control Phase. This focus is in addition to any points Haley allocates.
Storm Striders begin with three Power Tokens.

type.models: Field Mechaniks, Long Gunner Infantry, Trencher units

benefits.ingameeffect: You can begin the game with Haley Past and/or Haley Future in play. For each model in this unit in play at the start of the game you can redeploy one model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed in a location they could have been placed initially.
Units in the army gain Prowl during the first round of the game.
During your first turn of the game, models in Haley's battlegroup gain +2 SPD.

type.models: Long Gunner Infantry, Field Mechaniks, Stormblade Infantry, Trencher Infantry

benefits.ingameeffect: Up to one heavy warjack gains Advance Move for each Field Mechanik unit in the army.
You gain +1 to the starting roll for the game.
Add a unit attachment to one Long Gunner Infantry unit free of cost. The unit attachment ignores FA restrictions.

Friendly models may begin the game affected by Stryker's upkeep spells. The spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Stryker does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

tiers.name: Stryker2 - Charge of the Storm Brigade

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks, Thunderhead, Ol' Rowdy
Field Mechaniks, Storm Knight units, Stormsmith Storm Towers

benefits.ingameeffect: Storm Lance units in this army become FA 2. Reduce the point cost of Stormclad warjacks by 1.
Add a unit attachment to one Stormblade Infantry unit free of cost. The unit attachment ignores FA restrictions.

Place Major Katherine Laddermore and Storm Lance units after normal deployment. These models are placed at the same time as your models with Advance Deployment (if any). These modelds must be place within you normal deployment zone.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks and colossal with SPD 5 or greater, Ol' Rowdy
Storm Knight solos, Arcane Tempest solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Increase the FA of Storm Lances by 1.
Models/units in the army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.
Warjacks gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Reduce the point cost of cavalry units by 1.

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks with ranged weapons, Lancers

benefits.ingameeffect: Arcane Tempest Gun Mage units in this army become FA U. Reduce the point cost of each Arcane Tempest Gun Mage unit by 1.
Add a unit attachment to one Arcane Tempest Gun Mage unit free of cost. The unit attachment ignores FA restrictions.
You gain +1 to the starting roll for the game.
Caine and Arcane Tempest models/units gain Stealth during the first round of the game.

You can redeploy one model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed normally.
Add one Gun Mage Captain Adept solo free of cost. This model does not count toward FA restrictions.
Your deployment is extended 2" forward.

Friendly models may begin the game affected by Caine's upkeep spells. The spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Caine does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks with SPD 6 or more

benefits.ingameeffect: Warjacks controlled by Trencher ’Jack Marshals gain Advance Deployment.

Add one Trencher Commando Scattergunner weapon attachment model to each Trencher Commando unit free of cost. Trencher Commando units with Scattergunner attachments can include up to 3 additional Scattergunners.

For every two Trencher units, place one wall template anywhere within 20" of the back edge of Caine’s deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Walls cannot be placed within 3" of another terrain feature, including another wall template. The walls are linear obstacles that grant cover.
Models in this army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Journeyman Warcaster, Squire, Stormknight solos, Stormsmith solos

benefits.ingameeffect: If the army includes a Journeyman Warcaster, the Journeyman Warcaster and any warjacks it controls gain Advance Deployment.
You gain +1 to the starting roll for the game.
Add a unit attachment to one Stormblade Infantry unit free of cost. The unit attachment ignores FA restrictions.
During the first turn of the game, Nemo's battlegroup gains +2 SPD.
The FA of Stormsmith Stormcallers increases by +1 for every heavy warjack included. Aditionally, Stormsmith Stormcallers gain Advance Deployment.
Firefly warjacks gain Advance Move.
Add one Stormsmith Storm Tower unit free of cost. This unit ignores FA restrictions.

Friendly models may begin the game affected by Nemo's upkeep spells. The spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Nemo does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

type.models: Lancers, Cygnar non-character warjacks with Immunity:Electricity, Thunderhead
Field Mechaniks, Cygnar units with Immunity:Electricity
Journeyman Warcasters, Cygnar solos with Immunity: Electricity

benefits.ingameeffect: Reduce the point cost of Stormguard units by 1.
After deployment but before the start of the game, you can place any number of your Stormwalls' Lightning Pods anywhere within 20" of the rear edge of your deployment zone.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.
During your first Control Phase of the game, warjacks in Nemo's battlegroup are each allocated 1 focus point.

Reduce the point cost of each Trencher Infantry and Trencher Commando unit by 1. Additionally, the FA of Trencher Cannon and Trencher Chain Gun units increase by 1 for every Trencher Infantry and Trencher Commandos unit included.
Add one Trencher Master Gunner solo free of cost. This model does not count toward FA restrictions.

For each Trencher Infantry and/or Trencher Commandos unit, place one 3" AOE cloud effect anywhere completely within 20" of Siege's deployment zone after both players have finished deploying their armies but before the first player takes the first turn. These cloud effects leave play after the first turn of the game.
Heavy warjacks in the army gain Advance Move.

type.models: Gun mage units, Long gunners, Field Mechanics
Allison Jakes, Journeyman Warcasters, Squire, Arlan Strangeways

benefits.ingameeffect: On the first turn, allocate one focus to each warjack in a battlegroup
Gain a free trench template per battlegroup
Lower the PC of warjacks within a battlegroup by 1

type.models: Field Mechaniks, Rangers, Cygnar Light Cavalry units, Black 13th Gun Mage Strike Team
Gun Mage Captain Adept, Cygnar Light Cavalry solos, Ranger solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Ranger units in this army become FA U. Reduce the point cost of each Ranger unit by 1.
You gain +1 to your starting roll for the game.

For each Ranger unit, place one wall template or 4" AOE forest anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Kraye's deployment zone after both players have finished deploying their armies but before the first player takes the first turn. Wall templates and forests cannot be placed within 3" of another terrain feature. Wall templates are linear obstacles that provide cover.
Heavy warjacks in Kraye's battlegroup gain Advance Deployment.

type.models: Journeyman warcaster, Squire, Captain Arlan Strangeways

benefits.ingameeffect: Models in Darius' battlegroup gain Pathfinder during the first turn of the game.
Add a unit attachment to one Sword Knight unit free of cost. The unit attachment ignores FA restrictions.
Reduce the point cost of each heavy warjack by 1.
Your deployment is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Field Mechaniks, Rangers, Stormblades, Stormsmith units
Squire, Stormblade solos or Stormsmith solos.

benefits.ingameeffect: During your first turn, when a Stormwall uses Activate Lightning Pod, you may place up to three Lightning Pods instead of placing one.
Halfjacks in the army gain Advance Deployment.
For each Stormwall in the army, add 1 Stormsmith Stormcaller solo to the army free of cost. These solos ignore FA restrictions.
Warjacks with Base ARM 19 gain +2 SPD during your first turn.

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks with ranged weapons
Arcane Tempest Gun Mage Pistoleers, Long Gunner Infantry, Field Mechaniks, Rangers

benefits.ingameeffect: Models in the army gain Pathfinder during the first turn of the game.
Long Gunner Infantry units gain Advance Move.

You can redeploy models from Sloan's battlegroup after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed in a location they could have been deployed normally.
Reduce the point cost of each heavy warjack by 1.

type.models: Field Mechaniks, Sword Knights, Morrowan units
Journeyman warcaster, Archduke Alain Runewood, Morrowan solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Precursor Knight units in this army gain FA U. Additionally, Harlan Versh, Illuminated One gains Advance Deployment.
Add a unit attachment to one Precursor Knight unit free of cost. The unit attachment ignores FA restrictions.
Precursor Knight and Sword Knight units gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Heavy warjacks in Blaize's battlegroup without ranged weapons gain Advance Move.

type.models: Lieutenant Allison Jakes, Squire, Stormsmith solos, Trencher solos

benefits.ingameeffect: For each Trencher unit in the army, increase the FA of Stormsmith Stormcallers by 1.
Trencher models/units in the army gain Pathfinder during the first round of the game.
Stormsmith weapon crews in the army gain Advance Deployment
Add one Grenadier or Firefly to Jakes’ battlegroup free of cost.
